mapper.select:
select data_id, standard_name, standard_desc, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp, form_code, data_index, status, audit_status, company_code, update_user, update_date, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, pid, remark, org_type, standard_keys, standard_num, standard_status, ics_type, choice_type, year_num from standard_base where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and standard_name like '%${standardName}%'
and standard_desc like '%${standardDesc}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and form_code like '%${formCode}%'
and data_index like '%${dataIndex}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and company_code like '%${companyCode}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and pid like '%${pid}%'
and remark like '%${remark}%'
and org_type like '%${orgType}%'
and standard_keys like '%${standardKeys}%'
and standard_num like '%${standardNum}%'
and standard_status like '%${standardStatus}%'
and ics_type like '%${icsType}%'
and choice_type like '%${choiceType}%'
and year_num like '%${yearNum}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
